content:
A simple example of bash block code:
echo "Date: $(date)" echo "My first post with hugo" An another example of terraform block code:
resource "a_resource" "my_resource_name" { key = "value" anotherkey = "another value" } And finally, a graph with mermaid description:
graph LR A--B A--C B--D C--D
title: My First Post
